lead_paragraph: Ms. Baer, a longtime official for the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, also was the first woman named as its aviation director and the first woman to run the Lincoln Tunnel.

headline.print_headline: Susan Baer, 65; Ran New York Area’s 3 Major Airports
headline.main: Susan M. Baer, Transportation Pioneer Who Ran New York’s Airports, Dies at 65

snippet: Ms. Baer, a longtime official for the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, also was the first woman named as its aviation director and the first woman to run the Lincoln Tunnel....
abstract: Susan M Baer, Port Authority of New York and New Jersey official who was first person to have run all three major New York metropolitan area airports and first female aviation director, dies at age 65.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
